title: Fridge Hums
description: A selection of refrigerator hum sound effects that can add a touch of everyday life to your game.
longDescription:
Inside this library, you'll find a variety of refrigerator hums, each meticulously recorded to ensure quality and authenticity. Whether you're a sound designer, filmmaker, or content creator, these sounds are a valuable addition to your creative toolkit.


Key Features:

  1. Multiple Models: Our collection includes hums from different refrigerator models, giving you options to suit your project's specific needs.
  2. Range of Soundscapes: From soft and subtle hums to slightly more noticeable vibrations, these sounds suit various settings, such as kitchens, offices, or laboratories.
  3. High-Quality Recordings: Professionally recorded and mastered for top-tier audio quality.
  4. Versatile Usage: Perfect for film, television, commercials, video games, animations, podcasts, and more.
  5. Easy Integration: seamless looping for easy integration into your game.


Whether you're aiming to create a cosy atmosphere, add depth to a location, or provide subtle background audio, this library provides you with the tools to enhance your creative work.

Your players will appreciate the authenticity and ambience these sounds bring to your content.
technicalDetails:

  •  19 Audio WAVS, 19 Audio Cues
  •  16 bit, 44.1 kHz
  •  Seamless looping ✅
  • 25+ Minutes of Audio
  • Windows and Mac Supported
